segments.text: I ’ m hungry , let ’ s go grab a bite to eat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah me too . Oh ! Can we stop at the shop really fast ? I lost my makeup bag at the airport and I want to pick up a few things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! We have been here for almost an hour ! I thought you said you were only going to get a few things ! How long does it take you to pick out a lipstick and some nail polish !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you crazy ? You have no idea what you are talking about ! Just for my eyes I have to get eye-liner , an eyelash curler , eye shadow , an eyebrow pencil and mascara . Then I need to get foundation , liquid foundation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Whoa whoa whoa ! Are you nuts ? How much is all this going to cost ? I ’ m looking at the price at each one of these little things and it ’ s outrageous ! This is basically a crayon !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about you ? You spend as much or more money on your razors , after shave , cologne and gel ! Not to mention how much you spend on clothes and ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine ! Get the stupid thirty dollar crayon !
segments.speaker: S1
